TopicTitle: Extrasolar: Planets Beyond Kerbol scatterer and clouds don't working

Articles.Content: I installed a mod called After kerbin 1.7.3 and everything worked as it should, but when I installed Extrasolar: Planets Beyond Kerbol at the beginning everything was ok but when I saw what with the Valentine system it turned out that these planets do not work scatterer and clouds. Please help.
